[Steinbeck's Outfitting]
description: Beneath an uneven wooden ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the tattered canvas walls.  An etched brass bin and a wicker basket sit in opposite corners while a worn rug rests on an unfinished wooden floor.
